label: Simple
description: A minimal README template for quick project setup.
content:
# Project Title

A brief description of what this project does and who it's for

## Features

- Feature 1
- Feature 2

## Installation

```bash
npm install
```

## Usage

```bash
npm start
```

label: Professional
description: A professional template with license, about, and contributing sections.
content:
# Project Title

![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg)

## 🚀 About

Describe your project in 1-2 sentences.

## 🛠️ Built With

- React
- Node.js
- Express

## Getting Started

```bash
git clone https://github.com/your-username/your-repo.git
cd your-repo
npm install
npm start
```

## Contributing

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for guidelines.

label: Card Style
description: A visually distinctive card-style README template.
content:
Project Name

A short and catchy project description goes here.

--- ## 🚀 Features - Feature 1 - Feature 2 - Feature 3 ## 🛠️ Tech Stack - React - Node.js - Express ## 📦 Installation ```bash git clone https://github.com/your-username/your-repo.git cd your-repo npm install ``` ## 🏃 Usage ```bash npm start ```

label: Startup Card
description: A startup-style README card with call-to-action.
content:
🚀 Startup Project

Innovate. Disrupt. Deliver.

--- ## ✨ Highlights - 🚀 Fast and scalable - 🔒 Secure by design - 🌐 Modern stack ## 📦 Quick Start ```bash git clone https://github.com/your-username/your-repo.git cd your-repo npm install npm run dev ```
